mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EP_export_progress (id, project_id, `type`, total_count, completed_count, percent, finished, message, error_msg, result_resource, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{projectId}, #{type}, #{totalCount}, #{completedCount}, #{percent}, #{finished}, #{message}, #{errorMsg}, #{resultResource}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, project_id, type, total_count, completed_count, percent, finished, message, error_msg, result_resource, create_time, update_time FROM EP_export_progress WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id, project_id, type, total_count, completed_count, percent, finished, message, error_msg, result_resource, create_time, update_time FROM EP_export_progress WHERE project_id=#{projectId}
mapper.update: UPDATE EP_export_progress SET completed_count=#{completedCount}, percent=#{percent}, message=#{message}, error_msg=#{errorMsg}, finished=#{finished}, result_resource=#{resultResource} WHERE id=#{id}
